Line polygon

This dataset represents road width for testing.

data(l_poly)

Format

A SpatialPolygon

Examples

not_run({
  l = routes_fast[13,]
  l_poly = buff_geo(l, 8)
  plot(l_poly)
  plot(routes_fast, add = TRUE)
  # allocate road width to relevant line
  devtools::use_data(l_poly)
})

  • Examples
